desc: The Gold Trout is a brick-and-mortar and online mercantile focused on curating sustainable and beautiful products for our community. At the heart of our business is you -- so, we bring together the very best handcrafted, eco-friendly products that improves the well-being of you and your family.

layout.text: Our heart and soul is showcasing the work of small businesses! Let us help you find something for your loves.
